summary: This bill, the Apex Area Technical Corrections Act, amends the Apex Project, Nevada Land Transfer and Authorization Act of 1989. It aims to include the City of North Las Vegas and the Apex Industrial Park Owners Association in the project. The bill modifies several sections of the original act. Revisions involve land transfers, environmental compliance, and clarify definitions of involved parties. It also addresses mineral sales and their regulations within the Apex Site, streamlining certain processes. The bill focuses on economic development and job creation in Southern Nevada.
